annotation_criteria.Beginner: Introduction to concepts, basics, getting started guides, simple explanations, tutorials for newcomers, general news accessible to all
annotation_criteria.Intermediate: Requires some technical background, moderate complexity, practical applications, tools and frameworks usage
annotation_criteria.Advanced: Deep technical content, production systems, research papers, architecture decisions, expert-level discussions, specialized knowledge required

summary.notes: Annotations cover all 210 articles in the current articles_classified.jsonl file. Labels are based on content complexity: Beginner for general news and introductory content, Intermediate for practical technical content, Advanced for research-level and production systems content.
